name: Rhythm Rowing
description:
Made for GMTK Game-jam 2018 in around 24h. It is recommended not to use Google Chrome to play the game, as it appear to sometime bug the game completely.

This is a race game where you can't go straight, rowing on one side will push you to the other; you need to row on both side to go straight forward.

It also is a bit of a rhythm game where there is no music, you choose the rhythm by rowing. As long as you keep rowing in cadence, your combo will rise and so will your speed.

Controls: 

  • You can row using the keys AD, QD, the arrow keys or R1,L1 on a controller. 
  • To pause, press the Escape key or Start on a controller.
  • To restart, press the R key or Select on a controller.
